TextLibrary.Text: I was right, they do have a combat task for us. Two Cytech ships have been conducting attacks on this system. The Quesadans have determined they are malfunctioning units, but still they hesitate to anger Cy-Tech by destroying them directly. Maybe Cy-Tech doesn't know they are haywire. They purchased the weapon to exchange with those who help them eliminate the ships. We will want to negotiate the exchange for their weapon on Quesada Tau.

I was right, they do have a combat task for us. Two Cytech ships have been conducting attacks on this system. The Quesadans have determined they are malfunctioning units, but still they hesitate to anger Cy-Tech by destroying them directly. Maybe Cy-Tech doesn't know they are haywire. They purchased the weapon to exchange with those who help them eliminate the ships. We will want to negotiate the exchange for their weapon on Quesada Tau.
